Welcome to knnmodel’s documentation!

class src.knnmodel.KNNModel(space='cosinesimil', method='hnsw', l2_normalize=True, is_fitted=False)
__init__(space='cosinesimil', method='hnsw', l2_normalize=True, is_fitted=False)
Parameters

  • space (str) – space used to build index see https://github.com/nmslib/nmslib/blob/master/manual/spaces.md, defaults to ‘cosinesimil’

  • method (str) – method used to build index see https://github.com/nmslib/nmslib/blob/master/manual/methods.md, defaults to ‘hnsw’

  • l2_normalize (bool) – should data be l2 normalized, defaults to True

  • is_fitted (bool) – is index fitted, defaults to False

_expand_dim_and_normalize(X)
Parameters

X (ndarray) – numpy array

Return type

ndarray

Returns

numpy array where each row is L2 normalized

fit(X, y=None, M=100, efC=2000, efS=2000)

Fit the knn_model provided by NMSLIB.

Parameters

  • X (ndarray) – data to fit the KNN on

  • y (Union[List, ndarray, None]) – labels/index to fit the KNN on (defaults to None)

  • M (int) –

  • efC (int) –

  • efS (int) –

load(folder_path)
Parameters

folder_path (str) – loads Knn model from folder_path

predict(X, n_neighbours=10, mode='raw', target='id', exclude_identity=False)
Parameters

  • X (ndarray) – data to predict on

  • n_neighbours (int) – number of neighbours

  • mode (str) –

    • raw : returns list of neighbours.

    • majority_voting : classification task (majority voting of all NN).

    • regression : regression task (mean of all NN).

  • target (str) –

    • id : returns ids (row index)

    • label : returns labels (if provided during fit)

  • exclude_identity (bool) – if predicting on the same dataset that KNN was fitted on, should we exclude identity match

Return type

Optional[List[Dict[str, Union[array, int, str, float]]]]

Returns

Predictions (raw list, majority votes or mean of nearest neighbours)

predict_id(X, n_neighbours=10, exclude_identity=False)
Parameters

  • X (ndarray) – data to predict on

  • n_neighbours (int) – number of neighbours

  • exclude_identity (bool) – if predicting on the same dataset that KNN was fitted on, should we exclude identity match

Return type

Union[Tuple[ndarray, ndarray], Tuple[None, None]]

Returns

Tuple of ids and distances

predict_on_training_set(n_neighbours=10, mode='raw', target='id', exclude_identity=False)
Parameters

  • n_neighbours (int) – number of neighbours

  • mode (str) –

    • raw : returns list of neighbours.

    • majority_voting : classification task (majority voting of all NN).

    • regression : regression task (mean of all NN).

  • target (str) –

    • id : returns ids (row index)

    • label : returns labels (if provided during fit)

  • exclude_identity (bool) – if predicting on the same dataset that KNN was fitted on, should we exclude identity match

Return type

Optional[List[Dict[str, Union[array, int, str, float]]]]

Returns

Predictions (raw list, majority votes or mean of nearest neighbours)

save(folder_path)
Parameters

folder_path (str) – serialize Knn model to folder_path
